ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Neolithic Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make basic neolithic research benches with faster work speed compared to spots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Neolithic Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced neolithic research buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Medieval Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make medieval research benches with faster work speed compared to their neolithic predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Medieval Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced medival research buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Industrial Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make industrial research benches with faster work speed compared to their medieval predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Industrial Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced industrial research buildings to enhance efficiency.
